member.name: T:Bogus.IBinder
member.summary: A binder is used in Faker[T] for extracting MemberInfo from T that are candidates for property/field faking.

member.name: M:Bogus.IBinder.GetMembers(System.Type)
member.summary: Given T, the method must return a Dictionary[string,MemberInfo] where string is the field/property name and MemberInfo is the reflected member info of the field/property that will be used for invoking and setting values. The returned Dictionary must encompass the full set of viable properties/fields that can be faked on T.
member.returns: The full set of MemberInfos for injection.

member.name: T:Bogus.Binder
member.summary: The default binder used in Faker[T] for extracting MemberInfo from T that are candidates for property/field faking.

member.name: F:Bogus.Binder.BindingFlags
member.summary: The binding flags to use when reflecting over T.

member.name: M:Bogus.Binder.#ctor
member.summary: Construct a binder with default binding flags. Public/internal properties and public/internal fields.

member.name: M:Bogus.Binder.#ctor(System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Construct a binder with custom binding flags.

member.name: M:Bogus.Binder.GetMembers(System.Type)
member.summary: Given T, the method will return a Dictionary[string,MemberInfo] where string is the field/property name and MemberInfo is the reflected member info of the field/property that will be used for invocation and setting values. The returned Dictionary must encompass the full set of viable properties/fields that can be faked on T.
member.returns: The full set of MemberInfos for injection.

member.name: T:Bogus.Bson.BValue
member.summary: Most, if not all of this BSON implementation was copied from https://github.com/kernys/Kernys.Bson. Just polished it up a bit for Bogus in 2017/C# 7.1.

member.name: T:Bogus.Database
member.summary: The main database object that can access locale data.

member.name: F:Bogus.Database.Data
member.summary: The root of all locales in a single BObject.

member.name: M:Bogus.Database.GetAllLocales
member.summary: Returns all locales available inside Bogus' assembly manifest.

member.name: M:Bogus.Database.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the default locale database.

member.name: M:Bogus.Database.GetLocale(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a locale from the locale lookup cache, if the locale doesn't exist in the lookup cache, the locale is read from the assembly manifest and added to the locale lookup cache.

member.name: M:Bogus.Database.ResetLocale(System.String)
member.summary: Reset, reload, and reinitialize the locale from Bogus' assembly resource. Any patches or modifications to the specified locale are destroyed.

member.name: M:Bogus.Database.HasKey(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if a key exists in the locale.

member.name: M:Bogus.Database.Get(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the JToken of the locale category path. If the key does not exist, then the locale fallback is used.

member.name: T:Bogus.DataCategoryAttribute
member.summary: DataCategory is used when resolving the final category name inside the locale. For example, a 'phone_numbers' is the data set name in a locale, but the C# style DataSet is PhoneNumbers; When a dataset is marked with DataCategory, you can specify that category name manually. If no data category is specified, then the C# class name is used.

member.name: P:Bogus.DataCategoryAttribute.Name
member.summary: The category name.

member.name: M:Bogus.DataCategoryAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a data category attribute with a specified category name.

member.name: T:Bogus.DataSet
member.summary: Data set methods that access the BSON database of locales.

member.name: M:Bogus.DataSet.ResolveCategory(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolves the 'category' type of a dataset type; respects the 'DataCategory' attribute.

member.name: M:Bogus.DataSet.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: P:Bogus.DataSet.Random
member.summary: The Randomizer

member.name: P:Bogus.DataSet.Category
member.summary: The category name inside the locale

member.name: P:Bogus.DataSet.Locale
member.summary: Current locale of the data set.

member.name: M:Bogus.DataSet.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a BSON value given a JSON path into the data set. Only simple "." dotted JSON paths are supported.

member.name: M:Bogus.DataSet.HasKey(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines if a key exists in the locale.

member.name: M:Bogus.DataSet.GetArray(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a BSON array given a JSON path into the data set. Only simple "." dotted JSON paths are supported.

member.name: M:Bogus.DataSet.GetObject(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a BSON object given a JSON path into the data set. Only simple "." dotted JSON paths are supported.

member.name: M:Bogus.DataSet.GetRandomArrayItem(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Picks a random string inside a BSON array. Only simple "." dotted JSON paths are supported.

member.name: M:Bogus.DataSet.GetFormattedValue(System.String)
member.summary: Picks a random string inside a BSON array, then formats it. Only simple "." dotted JSON paths are supported.

member.name: M:Bogus.DataSet.ParseTokens(System.String)
member.summary: Recursive parse the tokens in the string.

member.name: T:Bogus.Extensions.ExtensionsForString
member.summary: General helper string extensions for working with fake data.

member.name: M:Bogus.Extensions.ExtensionsForString.ClampLength(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Char)
member.summary: Clamps the length of a string filling between min and max characters. If the string is below the minimum, the string is appended with paddingChar up to the minimum length. If the string is over the maximum, the string is truncated at maximum characters; additionally, if the result string ends with whitespace, it is replaced with a paddingChar characters.

member.name: M:Bogus.Faker.MakeLazy``1(System.Int32,System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Returns an IEnumerable[T] with LINQ deferred execution. Generated values are not guaranteed to be repeatable until .ToList() is called.

member.name: M:Bogus.Faker.MakeLazy``1(System.Int32,System.Func{System.Int32,``0})
member.summary: Same as Make() except this method passes in the current index of the generation. Also, returns an IEnumerable[T] with LINQ deferred execution. Generated values are not guaranteed to be repeatable until .ToList() is called.

member.summary: Picks a random Enum of T. Works only with Enums.

member.summary: The current locale for the dataset.

member.name: M:Bogus.Faker.NewContext
member.summary: Triggers a new generation context

member.name: F:Bogus.Faker.GlobalUniqueIndex
member.summary: A global variable that is automatically incremented on every new object created by Bogus. Useful for composing property values that require uniqueness.

member.name: P:Bogus.Faker.UniqueIndex
member.summary: Alias for IndexGlobal.

member.name: P:Bogus.Faker.IndexGlobal
member.summary: A global static variable that is automatically incremented on every new object created by Bogus across all Faker[T]s in the entire application. Useful for composing property values that require uniqueness across the entire application.

member.name: F:Bogus.Faker.IndexFaker
member.summary: A local variable that is automatically incremented on every new object generated by the Faker[T] instance for lifetime of Faker[T].

member.name: F:Bogus.Faker.IndexVariable
member.summary: A local index variable that can be controlled inside rules with ++ and --. This variable's lifetime exists for the lifetime of Faker[T].

member.summary: HashID generator with default (string.Empty) salt. See: https://github.com/ullmark/hashids.net

member.summary: Generates fake objects of T.

member.name: M:Bogus.Faker`1.Clone
member.summary: Clones the internal state of a Faker[T] into a new Faker[T] so that both are isolated from each other. The clone will have internal state reset as if .Generate() was never

member.name: M:Bogus.Faker`1.GenerateForever(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an that can be used as an unlimited source of when iterated over. Useful for generating unlimited amounts of data in a memory efficient way. Generated values *should* be repeatable for a given seed when starting with the first item in the sequence.

member.summary: Only populates an instance of T.

member.summary: Checks if all properties have rules.

member.name: M:Bogus.Faker`1.AssertConfigurationIsValid(System.String)
member.summary: Asserts that all properties have rules. When StrictMode is enabled, an exception will be raised with complete list of missing rules. Useful in unit tests for fast forward fixing of missing rules.

member.summary: Composes a based on the failed validation results that can be readily used to raise the exception.

member.summary: Provides implicit type conversion from Faker[T] to T. IE: Order testOrder = faker;

member.name: M:Bogus.Randomizer.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor that uses the global static `. Changing the global static seed after this constructor runs will have no effect. A new randomizer is needed to capture a new global seed.

member.name: M:Bogus.Randomizer.ReplaceNumbers(System.String,System.Char)
member.summary: Replaces symbols with numbers. IE: ### -> 283
member.param: The symbol to search for in format that will be replaced with a number

member.name: M:Bogus.Randomizer.ReplaceSymbols(System.String,System.Char,System.Func{System.Char})
member.summary: Replaces each character instance in a string. Func is called each time a symbol is encountered.
member.param: The string with symbols to replace.
The symbol to search for in the string.
The function that produces a character for replacement. Invoked each time the replacement symbol is encountered.

member.name: M:Bogus.Randomizer.Replace(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces symbols with numbers and letters. # = number, ? = letter, * = number or letter. IE: ###???* -> 283QED4. Letters are uppercase.

member.name: M:Bogus.Randomizer.ClampString(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Clamps the length of a string filling between min and max characters. If the string is below the minimum, the string is appended with random characters up to the minimum length. If the string is over the maximum, the string is truncated at maximum characters; additionally, if the result string ends with whitespace, it is replaced with a random characters.

member.summary: The rule set this rule belongs to.

member.name: T:Bogus.IHasRandomizer
member.summary: Objects should implement this interface if they use a .

member.name: P:Bogus.IHasRandomizer.Random
member.summary: Access the randomizer on the implementing object. When the property value is set, the object is instructed to use the randomizer as a source of generating random values. Additionally, setting this property also notifies any dependent via .

member.name: T:Bogus.SeedNotifier`1
member.summary: The seed notifier's purpose is to keep track of any objects that might need to be notified when a seed/randomizer changes. For example, the Internet dataset depends on the Name dataset to generate data. If the randomizer seed changes in Internet, the Name dependency data set should be notified of this change too. This whole process is important in maintaining determinism in Bogus.

member.name: M:Bogus.SeedNotifier`1.Flow``1(``0)
member.summary: Causes to be remembered and tracked so that the will be notified when is called.

member.name: M:Bogus.SeedNotifier`1.Notify(Bogus.Randomizer)
member.summary: Pushes/notifies all tracked objects that a new randomizer has been set.
